cofh.lib.inventory

Class ComparableItemStack

  • java.lang.Object
    • cofh.lib.util.ComparableItem
      • cofh.lib.inventory.ComparableItemStack
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComparableItemStackNBT, ComparableItemStackSafe

    public class ComparableItemStack
extends ComparableItem
    This class allows for OreDictionary-compatible ItemStack comparisons and Integer-based Hashes without collisions. The intended purpose of this is for things such as Recipe Handlers or HashMaps of ItemStacks.
